story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: I see. So that’s what happened...
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
But you all did great! I’d expect nothing less from
the captains of Alola.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Yeah. Well done becoming allies with Tapu Bulu
and Tapu Lele.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Even if they do seem to be different from the
Alolan guardian deities I know.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: I am an Island Kahuna, after all.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Maybe like the Ultra Beasts, they came from a
different world than the one we live in...
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: Maybe even from a place similar to ours.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I know Acerola often disciplines kids, but I didn’t
expect her to do the same to Tapu Bulu.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: Acerola was a bit scary back then...
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Heh heh heh... You’d better not make me or
Tapu Bulu angry, OK?
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Heehee. The two of you are very similar.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Didn’t Tapu Lele also feel a connection with
you, Lana?
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
They’re both innocent and fond of jokes, so they do
have some similarities, huh?
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: Why are you acting like this is over?!
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: C’mon! You need to help us!
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: This doesn’t look like an easy task.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Even though Tapu Bulu and Tapu Lele will help
us out...
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: having to battle this long is tough!
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_2500_10: Time for us to trade places.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: Heh. Well, well. Look who’s here.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_2900_10: Use this time to regroup and recover!
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_3200_10:
I have some special outfits over there for the both
of you. They’re for the festival.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_3300_10: Their designs are inspired by the guardian deities.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_3400_10:
If you wear them, you’ll be able to connect even
more with Tapu Bulu and Tapu Lele. Think of them
as similar to sygna suits.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_3600_10: You’re sure to look great in them!
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_3700_10: The two of you DID fight hard and get pretty dirty.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_3800_10: OK, I’ll wear it! Thank you, everyone!
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_4100_10: Right, then. Shall we continue where we left off?
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_4200_10: Use this to heal your Pokémon.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_4400_10:
Once we’re ready, we’ll join Looker and the group
to help fight, too!
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_4800_10:
I never thought the three of us would be working
together again...
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_4900_10:
It’s very reassuring to battle alongside the both
of you.
story_alola_02_03000/2401_1001_5000_10: Yeah, I feel the same, too, Chief!
